name: Hammered
description:
Hammered is a retro-y pixel-art tribute to the hammer-fight scene in Oldboy.

TROUBLESHOOTING:- If when you load the game you don't see a menu - reload the page and it should sort itself out.

CONTROLS:

Z - Hammer attack    |     X - Kick attack

Left and Right Arrow keys - Move

Down Arrow Key - Crouch

P - Pause game

Made by @dangerdinosaur

(Apologies to Part Chan-Wook)
